column2: VEREIT, Inc. operates as a real estate investment trust, which provides real estate investment services. The company is headquartered in Phoenix, Arizona and currently employs 180 full-time employees. The firm owns and actively manages a diversified portfolio of single-tenant retail, restaurant, office and industrial real estate assets subject to long-term net leases with creditworthy tenants. The Companyâ€™s business model provides equity capital to creditworthy corporations in return for long-term leases on their properties. The firm focuses on single-tenant, net-leased properties that are strategically located and essential to the business operations of the tenant, as well as retail properties that offer necessity and value-oriented products or services.
